Class CardUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.mishmash.rally.CardUtils

public class CardUtils
extends java.lang.Object

A utilities class with only static methods to perform some simple but common actions in this class.

Author:
mrmcduff

originalWord - The word/string to be capitalized.

getWholeDeck

public static java.util.List<Card> getWholeDeck()
Convenience function for testing. Gets a list of cards containing the entire deck.

Returns:
The whole deck.

getSuit

public static java.util.List<Card> getSuit(Card.Suit suit)
A convenience function for getting an entire suit. Useful for testing (and for getting the whole deck). If you ask for the 'suit' of jokers, you get a list with just one joker.

Parameters:
suit - The suit to get.
Returns:
Ace through deuce of the desired suit.

getTopNCards

public static java.util.List<Card> getTopNCards(java.util.List<Card> entryList,
                                                int n)
Convenience function for getting the top N cards from a sorted list. Useful for shortening long hands, or picking out the best cards from a seven-card flush, or only a pair, etc.

Parameters:
entryList - The list to trim down.
n - The number to remain in the list.
Returns:
An n-long list if the original was at least n long. If not, we return an empty list.
